channel.title: Pythonhosted on Jürgen Gmach
channel.description: Recent content in Pythonhosted on Jürgen Gmach

item.title: How to Delete Documentation Hosted on pythonhosted.org
item.description: Today, I needed to lookup something in the documentation of lazr.config, which - you guessed it - is a configuration system, using an ini-like configuration file format. The number one search result on Google is still https://pythonhosted.org/lazr.config/. For projects on available on PyPI both wheels and packages are hosted on pythonhosted.org, and as it looks, at least before “my time” and before there was Read the Docs, also documentation was hosted on pythonhosted.
